quote: Dani said this woman, with whom she’d lived for two years, had never known her. “I feel like people accept the first thing I show them,” she said, “and that’s all I ever am to them.
quote_letters: DANI SAID THIS WOMAN WITH WHOM SHED LIVED FOR TWO YEARS HAD NEVER KNOWN HER I FEEL LIKE PEOPLE ACCEPT THE FIRST THING I SHOW THEM SHE SAID AND THATS ALL I EVER AM TO THEM
